name: The Boat
overview: A global cataclysm, caused by a fatal accident in Geneva (Switzerland) during the implementation of the particle accelerator will lead to the crew and students of the school-ship Polar Star to live the greatest adventure of their lives. Isolated and aware that we only have each other, the ship will become their only home.

episodes.name: The Last Raft of America Queen
The Priest and the Doctor Frankenstein
The Curious Case of Duck Manolito
The Energy That Moves the World
